title: Downloading and adding technical indicators to the historical data of a ticker — get_one_ticker

title: Downloading and adding technical indicators to the historical data of a ticker — get_one_ticker
text: ticker ticker company download start_date first date historical data end_date last date data mas List simple moving averages calculate ad_local_text want calculate local min max 20 period ad_percent_change want calculate percent change first day

title: Plot one stock — stock_show_one_plot
code: stock_show_one_plot(   ticker,   start_date = (Sys.Date() - 500),   end_date = Sys.Date(),   local_point_days = 20,   fullhd = FALSE )
